attributes.action: Amateur Football To Be Played Through Summer
attributes.additional_details: I would like the F.A to review Amateur football to be played during the summer and stop weeks on end football being cancelled due to 'Waterlogged' pitches and 100's of potential health and safety hazards that go along with bad weather, where as in summer there isn't, as simple as that! Will make a lot of people happy this way.

rejection.details: For the FA to consider, not the Government.
